summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CreatorFund platform. Backend APIs working excellently (94% success rate). Frontend core functionality working well with minor navigation issues. Investment flow, channel creation, team collaboration, and profit distribution all functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: My Channels and My Investments buttons not accessible from channel detail page

passed_tests: Team member addition with profit splits
All CRUD operations for channels, investments, team members
Landing page and auth modal functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix navigation buttons accessibility from channel detail page. The My Channels and My Investments buttons should be accessible from all pages, not just dashboard.
